attributes.action: Help property buyers in Turkey safe guard their investment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many thousands of UK residents have purchased property in various parts of Turkey since the change in the law allowing them to do so. A large amount of these have since lost everything due to builders double selling. This has to stop quickly before this happens to thousands more.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
